title: Steve Clarke hopes Scotland’s World Cup qualification will inspire next generation
description: Steve Clarke hopes Scotland’s long-awaited qualification for a men’s World Cup will inspire the country’s young footballers
content:
Steve Clarke hopes Scotland’s long-awaited qualification for a men’s World Cup will inspire the country’s young footballers.
Against a backdrop of euphoric scenes at Hampden Park on Tuesday night, the Scots defeated Denmark 4-2 to seal a World Cup sp... [2465 chars]

title: I am the king of the common cold - and I can tell you how to avoid one
description: No one suffers a cold like I do. Drops and brandy don’t touch the sides – but thanks to a friendly singer, I’ve learned a more extreme regime for countering the snuffles, writes Adrian Chiles
content: This time last year, I was on a TV programme with three singers. There was a rapper of Ghanaian heritage, a big pop star, and a famous mezzo-soprano. It was deep midwinter. The night before, I’d been at an old friend’s 60th birthday, crammed into the... [3721 chars]

title: Wintry conditions to last in coastal areas after up to 7cm of snow fell in parts of UK
description: North Scotland and east and west coasts of UK to get wintry showers but conditions will be brighter and drier inland
content:
Wintry conditions are expected to continue in coastal areas of the UK after up to 7cm (2.7in) of snow fell in parts of the country.
The Met Office said conditions in central inland areas were likely to be brighter and drier, while wintry showers were... [2408 chars]

title: Three people in their 80s arrested over child sex abuse in Bradford
description: It comes as eight victims allege abuse in Bradford dating back to the 1970s.
content:
Three people in their 80s have been arrested following reports of child sexual abuse at care homes in Bradford.
A woman aged 83 and two men aged 83 and 86 were arrested at addresses in Cumbria and Kent, West Yorkshire Police said.
The arrests come af... [264 chars]

title: It’s Unsettling - NASA Rover Found a Rock on Mars That Doesn’t Belong There
description: A peculiar rock has caught the attention of NASA scientists after the Perseverance rover spotted it in the Jezero Crater on Mars.
content: The find occurred during one of Perseverance’s routine surveys of the Martian surface, more than five years into its mission. The rover, which has been traversing the floor of an ancient crater believed to have once hosted water, is equipped with cam... [4008 chars]
